title: Two Friends
brief_description: A film about the troubled middle teenage years of two school girls, exploring the change in their relationship over a year. Louise and Kelly were good friends but as the year progresses, the two girls grow apart. The story is told in five separate periods over the year. It begins in the present and ends in the past. Written by Helen Garner.
